title: Crocodile or chicken skewers with cashew nut satay
description: Crocodile is like a really firm white fish crossed with chicken breast. It's an easy eat and very lovely.
ingredients: 1 piece crocodile fillet or 2 large chicken breasts
salt and freshly ground black pepper
palm sugar or light brown muscovado sugar, to taste (optional)
approx 8-12 bamboo skewers or cocktail sticks, for assembling
